question: Assalamualikum, reg Removing un wanted hair on the body
answer:
QUESTION
Is it permissable to use some chemical like things to remove unwanted hairs on the body viz,hands legs and other parts of the body , please guide me .. Jzakallh u khair
ANSWER


Share:
On those portions of the body where it is permissible to remove hair, it
will be permissible to do so using chemicals.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
